name: NSTextFinderClient
desc: A set of methods implemented by objects that support searching using the NSTextFinder class and the in-window text find bar.

items.name: var string: String
items.desc: Allows the client to specify a single string for searching.

items.name: func string(at: Int, effectiveRange: NSRangePointer, endsWithSearchBoundary: UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> String
items.desc: Returns the found string that is created by conceptually mapping its content to a single string, which is composed of a concatenation of all its substrings.

items.name: func stringLength() -> Int
items.desc: Returns the full length of the conceptually concatenated string return by the stringAtIndex:effectiveRange:endsWithSearchBoundary: method.

items.name: func shouldReplaceCharacters(inRanges: [NSValue], with: [String]) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the specified strings should be replaced.

items.name: func replaceCharacters(in: NSRange, with: String)
items.desc: Replaces the text in the specified range with the new string.

items.name: func didReplaceCharacters()
items.desc: Specifies whether text characters were replaced.

items.name: var isSelectable: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the text is selectable.

items.name: var allowsMultipleSelection: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether multiple items can be selected.

items.name: var selectedRanges: [NSValue]
items.desc: Returns an array of selected ranges.

items.name: var isEditable: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the text is editable.

items.name: func contentView(at: Int, effectiveCharacterRange: NSRangePointer) -> NSView
items.desc: Returns the view the context is displayed in.

items.name: func scrollRangeToVisible(NSRange)
items.desc: Scrolls the specified range such that it is visible.

items.name: var visibleCharacterRanges: [NSValue]
items.desc: An array of visible character ranges.

items.name: func drawCharacters(in: NSRange, forContentView: NSView)
items.desc: Draw the glyphs for the requested character range as they are drawn in the given content view.
